title: 短片-末影龙袭击村庄呢~
author: 辉月颐
txt_content:
本帖最后由 辉月颐 于 2014-2-3 18:27 编辑 

歌词：http://youtube.wikia.com/wiki/YouTube... Lyrics: I'm waking up to TNT  I eat my pork and I craft my sword I'm covered in, these spider webs oh woah  they're breakin in, suprise attack, so I jump on my horse's back this is it, the apocalypse  woah...I'm waking up,   I made a dumb mistake  enough to make an earthquake  Welcome to a new day, to a new day welcome to a new day, with an update Woah woah woah, it couldn't get worse, Imagine Dragons, Ender Dragons Woah woah woah, it couldn't get worse, Imagine Dragons, Ender Dragons  I raise my sword, don my armor it's an uprising I suppose we're painted grey to fit right in woah they're breakin in, suprise attack, so I jump on my horse's back this is it, the apocalypse  woah I'm waking up  I made a dumb mistake  enough to make an earthquake  Welcome to a new day, to a new day welcome to a new day, with an update Woah woah woah, it couldn't get worse, Imagine Dragons, Ender Dragons Woah woah woah, it couldn't get worse, Imagine Dragons, Ender Dragons  All Golems go, zombie's will hide  Deep in my bones, infected inside中文歌词（手动翻译）我醒来看到TNT,我制作剑，我手里的剑被这些蜘蛛网覆盖了，哇，他们袭击了，我跳上马背准备逃跑，我又醒来了， 我犯了个愚蠢的错误 ，新的一天 。欢迎来到新的一天，一个新的开始 哇哇哇，它不会变得更糟，末影龙 哇哇哇，它不会变得更糟，末影龙 我举起剑，穿上我的盔甲 这是一个战争，我想 我们为灰色画上句号 哇 他们突然袭击了，我醒来看到TNT,我制作剑，我手里的剑被这些蜘蛛网覆盖了，哇，他们袭击了，我跳上马背准备逃跑，我又醒来了， 我犯了个愚蠢的错误 ，新的一天 。欢迎来到新的一天，一个新的开始 哇哇哇，它不会变得更糟，末影龙 哇哇哇，它不会变得更糟，末影龙所有的傀儡，僵尸会隐藏 在我的身体内感染
接下来上视频
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNjY4ODUzNjky/v.swf求回复

replies.txt_content: 这首歌是电影（宿主）的主题曲
